text: Jerry John Rawlings (22 June 1947 - 12 November 2020) was a Ghanaian politician and military official. He served as the 1st President of the Fourth Republic Ghana serving from 1993 to 2001. Rawlings died at a hospital in Accra on 12 November 2020 from COVID-19, aged 73.Jerry Rawlings, ex-Ghanaian president, dies from COVID-19 ==References== ==Other websites== * Flight Lieutenant Jeremiah John Rawlings * Official Website * Biography of Jerry J.
